LADIES' CODE

Introduction

Sojung is a South Korean singer-songwriter and composer. She is a member of the girl group LADIES' CODE.

She made her solo debut on May 4, 2017, with the digital single "Better than Me".

On February 16, 2020, it was announced that Sojung, along with the other members, did not renew their contract with Polaris Entertainment.
